5link1.  Create local Users

6link

7link    
Description
Screenshot / Details
Create local Aneo Service User
Run this script in an administrative powershell session
# (c) mho@aneo.at # V1.0
#
#----------------- SETTINGS -----------------------
$localusername="lsvc_aneo"
$localuserdescription="ANEO Administration User"
Write-Host "Bitte Passwort für lokalen aneo service User lsvc_aneo angeben:"
$password = Read-Host -AsSecureString
New-LocalUser -Name $localusername -Password $password
-FullName $localusername -Description $localuserdescription Set-LocalUser -Name $localusername -PasswordNeverExpires 1 #Try on German-System
Add-LocalGroupMember -Group "Administratoren" -Member
$localusername
#Try on English System
Add-LocalGroupMember -Group "Administrators" -Member
$localusername
# Save or See passwords in the 1PW-Vault

1linkINSD Script 04 Create local Users for Kostwein– 187

2link

3link![image](file:///C:/Users/mario/OneDrive/Kostwein/Veeam/TDO%20Tech%20Doc%20Overview%20Backup%20Kostwein-v33-20240617_105833_files/Image_595.png)

4link

5link1.  Create local Users

6link

7link    
Description
Screenshot / Details
Create local Kostwein Users
# (c) mho@aneo.at
Run this script in an administrative powershell session
# V1.0
#
#----------------- SETTINGS -----------------------
$localusernames=@("adm.kw.dolzerp","adm.kw.gschwandtnerd","a
dm.kw.roblt","adm.kw.sibitzd")
$localuserdescription="Kostwein Administration User"
Write-Host "Bitte Passwort für lokale Kostwein User
angeben:"
$password = Read-Host -AsSecureString
forEach ($localusername in $localusernames)
{
New-LocalUser -Name $localusername -Password $password
-FullName $localusername -Description $localuserdescription
Set-LocalUser -Name $localusername -PasswordNeverExpires 1
#Try on German-System
Add-LocalGroupMember -Group "Administratoren" -Member
$localusername
#Try on English System
Add-LocalGroupMember -Group "Administrators" -Member
$localusername
# Save or See passwords in the 1PW-Vault

Description
Screenshot / Details
}
Save the password in the 1PW Vault

Create local Service User for Veeam WAN Accelerators
Run this script in an administrative powershell session
# (c) mho@aneo.at # V1.0
#
#----------------- SETTINGS -----------------------
$localusername="svc-veeam-wanac"
$localuserdescription="Service-User für Veeam WAN Accelerators"
Write-Host "Bitte Passwort für lokalen Service User $ ($localusername) angeben:"
$password = Read-Host -AsSecureString
New-LocalUser -Name $localusername -Password $password
-FullName $localusername -Description $localuserdescription Set-LocalUser -Name $localusername -PasswordNeverExpires 1 #Try on German-System
Add-LocalGroupMember -Group "Administratoren" -Member
$localusername
#Try on English System
Add-LocalGroupMember -Group "Administrators" -Member
$localusername

24link2.  Lokale Benutzer anlegen

25link

26link    
Lokalen Aneo Admin-Benutzer anlegen
Mit Domain-Aneo Admin Benutzer anmelden und lokale Benutzer anlegen
Dazu werden diese Schritte durchgeführt:
INSD Script 01 Create local Users for Aneo (see page 175)
Lokalen Service Benutzer für Proxy anlegen
Dazu werden diese Schritte durchgeführt:
INSD Script 02 Create local Users on Veeam Proxy Servers (see page 179)
Lokalen Service Benutzer für VeeamOne anlegen
Dazu werden diese Schritte durchgeführt:
https://aneo.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ANEO/pages/153550961/ INSD+Script+03+Create+local+Service+Users+on+Veeam+VBR+Servers (see page 182)
Lokale Kostwein Admin-Benutzer anlegen
Dazu werden diese Schritte durchgeführt:
INSD Script 04 Create local Users for Kostwein (see page 187)

1link1.  General purpose of this documentation

2link

3link    This documentation is the template of all installation that where performed in march 2023 to provide Veeam Backup & Replication to all ordered Aneo Backup Apliances and Hardware for the branch offices of Kostwein Maschinenbau GmbH.

5link2.  Preperation and Information for Installation

6link

7link    
Description
Screenshot / Details
Installation-Media / Software
Download Veeam Installation Media
The installation files were downloaded from the veeam website and then uploaded to the ESX-Host in the ESX-Datastore.
After mounting the .iso the install files were copied to C:\Install\VeeamV12
License Files
The necessary Veeam License file was provided from Kostwein (Daniel Gschwandtner) and copied to
C:\Install\VeeamV12-License\Veeam-250instances-suite-subscription.lic
Edge-Browser
To have a modern Browser on the VBR-Server the Edge-Browser was downloaded and copied to this folder:
"C:\Install\Edge\MicrosoftEdgeEnterpriseX64.msi"

112link    Fullbackups immer im Zeitfenster 19:00 bis 24:00

116link    Alle anderen Datenbank Transaktionlog Backup alle 120 Min.

117link

118link    Log DB Laufwerk hat 350 GB SQL Always On Cluster

122link    Umschalten der Datenbank von einem Node auf den anderen nur dann gut möglich, wenn kein Benutzer Zugriff ist → Wartungsfenster notwendig. ![image](file:///C:/Users/mario/OneDrive/Kostwein/Veeam/TDO%20Tech%20Doc%20Overview%20Backup%20Kostwein-v33-20240617_105833_files/Image_1722.png) Termin

123link

 Art des Backups im Jobnamen erkenntlich machen z.b. SQL Simple

Tab Maintenance ->
Wenn kein Haken bei "Remove deleted items data after" gesetzt ist, würde die letzte
Backup-Kette noch bestehen bleiben, wenn die VM gelöscht werden würde.
Wenn der Dekommisionierungsprozess aber gut definiert ist, dann könnten Backups
von "gelöschten" Systemen auch automatisch gelöscht werden.

# Windows PowerShell-Skript für AD DS-Bereitstellung #
Import-Module ADDSDeployment Install-ADDSForest `

-DatabasePath "C:\Windows\NTDS" `
-DomainMode "WinThreshold" `
-DomainName "kowdr.local" `
-DomainNetbiosName "KOWDR" `
-ForestMode "WinThreshold" `
-InstallDns:$true `
-LogPath "C:\Windows\NTDS" `
-NoRebootOnCompletion:$false `
-SysvolPath "C:\Windows\SYSVOL" `
-Force:$true

1link1.  General purpose of this documentation

2link

3link    This documentation is the template of all installation that where performed in march 2023 to provide Veeam Backup & Replication to all ordered Aneo Backup Apliances and Hardware for the branch offices of Kostwein Maschinenbau GmbH.

4link

5link2.  Preperation and Information for Installation

6link

7link    
Description
Screenshot / Details
Installation-Media / Software
Download Veeam Installation Media
The installation files were downloaded from the Veeam website. After mounting the .iso the install files were copied to C:\Install\Veeam
License Files
The necessary Veeam License file was provided from Kostwein (Daniel Gschwandtner) and copied to
C:\Install\
Edge-Browser
To have a modern Browser on the VBR-Server the Edge-Browser was downloaded and copied to this folder:
"C:\Install\MicrosoftEdgeEnterpriseX64.msi"
